timeline.bodyText: interesting...are we allowing inner-class imports now? [I think it's fine...I just thought this would fail spotless]
timeline.author: jkwatson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -52,9 +53,9 @@ public SamplingResult shouldSample(
       Context parentContext,
       String traceId,
       String name,
-      Span.Kind spanKind,
-      ReadableAttributes attributes,
-      List<SpanData.Link> parentLinks) {
+      Kind spanKind,
+      Attributes attributes,
+      List<Link> parentLinks) {

timeline.bodyText: now that the ordering requirement on attributes has been relaxed, we could go back to returning our array-backed ones here, if we wanted to. Not a change that needs to be in this PR.
timeline.author: jkwatson
